Jayde is rather put out.  She's too small to be of any assistance 
installing the new engine components, or not strong enough, or not 
skilled enough in mechanical matters, or whatever.  So she is reduced 
to pacing restlessly.

"Look," Gatara finally tells her, "if you've got that much energy, 
why don't you go out on patrol?"

"Sure!" Jayde dashes for the exit.

"And stay out of trouble!" the larger femme calls after her.

"Stay out of trouble?"  This puts Jayde in an even worse mood.  
"Jeez, does she think I can't fight or something?  Ooooh, I'll show 
them!"

She races past Torin, barely taking the time to call "Patrol!" in his 
direction before changing over to rocket-skiff mode and blasting off.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> While the others are working on moving the gear, Torin is 
dismantling 
> the transport.  Finding the bomb Flicker had planted, he smiles.  
> "Sneaky little bug, aren't you?"  Disarming the device takes 
several 
> minutes.
